extendedInfo.description: ********* ********* ********* ********* ********* ********* UPDATE : Adding questions. Redefinition of certain issues that could lead to confusion and thus conclude that a question wrong. Such problems of calculation: addition of parentheses or the mixture of colors with the notion of "Subtractive" ...********* ********* ********* ********* ********* *********SuperQuizz is a french quiz game - in french language.SuperQuizz is a game that consists of questions to test your general knowledge or specific. It can be played alone or with others (4 players max). For each question four solutions are proposed. Only one answer is possible.SuperQuizz offers 3 different games as possible:- The largest suite is to perform more exact answer as a result by having three wild card. In multiplayer, when all players have lost the player who scored the highest number of points won.- The Time Trial is to score as maximum point in a given time. You can choose between 1, 2, 3, 5 minutes. In multiplayer, when all players have finished, the player who scored the highest number of points won.- For point is to reach a defined number of points in a minimum of questions. You have the choice of 100.300, 500, 1000 points. In multiplayer, the player who reaches the goal first wins.SuperQuizz is a community quiz. You can suggest questions to quiz using the button "Submit a Question" page on the main menu or the Internet.
